column4: Hi, I have to run a python script on many files, is there an easy way to write a python script, that runs a script on that files in parallel? I have a intel i7 and so 8 threads but at the moment, only one is doing the job
not sure if there is anything in python to aid you in the threading.. you might want to ask in ##python
yeah, i just recognized i'm in the wrong channel ;)
